p: Although the lipoprotein profile in serum was significantly changed by dietary protein and fat sources, it is noteworthy that body weight gain was similar among the groups ( Fig 1A). Neither tofu, which exclusively suppressed LAC levels, nor fish oil, which modulated various classes of lipoprotein levels, affected the growth of animals. These dietary components efficiently halved LAC levels. These results suggest that serum lipid profiles were favorably improved without affecting healthy growth.
